name: Bubble Builder
description:
Inspired by Agar.io, this single-player HTML5 game lets you collect colorful resources and build a base that generates more resources. Currently the end-game is to collect enough resources to build a large storage silo. Save games are stored locally in your browser.

This is a  prototype demo and is not currently under development. If you like the idea and would like to see work continue on this project, leave a comment letting me know!
